entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
